course_description: Fall. Prerequisite: Japanese 302 or consent of instructor. Conducted in Japanese, the course focuses upon Japanese culture through readings and discussion of literary texts and materials from current periodicals and newspapers.
prerequisites: JPN 302 or JPN 302W or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 2492, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 1-2:15p, Instructor: S. Goss, Status: Open
